def percent_wins(a):
    home_wins = a[a['home_wins']==True].home_wins.count()
    draw=a[a['draw']==True].draw.count()
    away_wins=a[a['away_wins']==True].away_wins.count()
    total_game = a['date'].count()
    percent_of_home_wins = (home_wins/total_game)*100
    percent_of_away_wins = (away_wins/total_game)*100
    print('home' ,percent_of_home_wins, 'away ',percent_of_away_wins)
